document_data.name: ''Ring of Dwarven Bone''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of dwarven bone''''' were [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[ring]]s carved from the bones of [[dwarves]].
document_data.Powers: Those that wore one of these rings were imbued with a minor boon to their strength.
document_data.History: These rings were typically worn by the more savage and malicious [[orc]]ish clans of [[the North]]. Orc [[shaman]]s crafted them from the gathered remains of dwarves and then enchanted them with their foul [[magic]].
